description.black-white:
The user shrouds itself in electricity
and smashes into its target.
It also damages the user a little.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.shortEffect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
